metadata.title: CVE-2018-17141 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
HylaFAX 6.0.6 and HylaFAX+ 5.6.0 allow remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a dial-in session that provides a FAX page with the JPEGbit enabled, which is mishandled in FaxModem::writeECMData() in thefaxd/CopyQuality.c++ file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17141` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hylafax-client - 3:6.0.6-6+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
hylafax-server - 3:6.0.6-6+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hylafax package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3:6.0.6-6+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
